title: Looking for Dia+ Dynamic Queue players
body:
Looking for people who want to climb to masters/challengers in dynamic queue. 

Preferably a group of 4 or 5. 

Personally able to play 8-12 hours a day, willing to play whatever role but pref JG.

Add ingame and invite if you see me online...

replies.body: If you find a team i would love to come along, Trying to  find someone to play ranked with all day, and not just 2-3 games.
